statements: SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 5 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 10 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM products GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_quantity < 50 ORDER BY avg_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity < 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.order_quantity > 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE CAST(transaction_amount AS DECIMAL) > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, order_quantity FROM products LEFT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 5 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY stock_level DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT products.product_name, stock_logs.action_type, stock_logs.action_date FROM products JOIN stock_logs ON products.product_id = stock_logs.product_id WHERE stock_logs.action_type = 'Restock'

SELECT warehouses.location, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM warehouses INNER JOIN products ON warehouses.warehouse_id = products.product_id GROUP BY warehouses.location HAVING SUM(capacity) > 100
